headerValueShouldBe.description: Report message when 'x-ua-compatible' doesn't have the value 'ie=edge'

metaElementDuplicated.description: Report message when the 'x-ua-compatible' meta element is duplicated
metaElementDuplicated.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element is not needed as one was already specified.

metaElementNotBody.description: Report message when the 'x-ua-compatible' meta element is in <body>
metaElementNotBody.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element should be specified in the '<head>', not '<body>'.

metaElementShouldBeSpecified.description: Report message when the 'x-ua-compatible' element should be specified

metaElementShouldNotBeSpecified.description: Report message when 'x-ua-compatible' meta element is not needed
metaElementShouldNotBeSpecified.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element should not be specified as it is not needed.

metaElementShouldNotBeSpecifiedUseHeader.description: Report message to suggest using HTTP header instead of meta element
metaElementShouldNotBeSpecifiedUseHeader.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element should not be specified, and instead, equivalent HTTP header should be used.

metaElementValueShouldBe.description: Report message when the 'x-ua-compatible' meta element has the wrong value
metaElementValueShouldBe.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element 'content' attribute value should be 'ie=edge', not '$1'.

metaElementWrongPosition.description: Report message when the 'x-ua-compatible' meta element is in the wrong position
metaElementWrongPosition.message: 'x-ua-compatible' meta element should be specified before all other elements except for '<title>' and other '<meta>' elements.

responseShouldInclude.description: Report message when 'x-ua-compatible' is not included

responseUnneeded.message: Response should not include unneeded 'x-ua-compatible' header.
